chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
taifoli: terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface

Goal:
forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> terms_and_indices_from_one entries

Premises:
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
term = nat : Set
nwPackets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (nwPackets, _) := n in nwPackets : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> list packet Arguments nwPackets {P params}
Inductive refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RRIR_init : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RRIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (gd : electionsData
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.msg Arguments pBody {P params}
Record terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface { terms_and_indices_from_one_log_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log net; terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw net } Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _)%function_scope
terms_and_indices_from_one = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (l : list entry) => forall e : entry, In e l -> eTerm e >= 1 /\ eIndex e >= 1 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> Prop Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntriesReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%list_scope _%bool_scope
Notation leaderId := (RaftState.leaderId term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
logIndex = nat : Set
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope

update_elections_data_appendEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) => let (_, m) := handleAppendEntries me (snd st) t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit in match m with | AppendEntriesReply t0 entries0 true => {| votes := votes (fst st); votesWithLog := votesWithLog (fst st); cronies := cronies (fst st); leaderLogs := leaderLogs (fst st); allEntries := map (fun e : entry => (t0, e)) entries0 ++ allEntries (fst st) |} | AppendEntriesReply t0 entries0 false => fst st | _ => fst st end : forall (orig_base_params...
SpecLemmas.handleAppendEntries_not_append_entries : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> ~ (exists (t0 : term) (n0 : name) (prevT : logIndex) (prevI : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex), m = AppendEntries t0 n0 prevT prevI entries c)
SpecLemmas.handleTimeout_not_is_append_entries : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (st' : list raft_output * raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg), handleTimeout h st = (st', ms) -> In m ms -> ~ (exists (t : term) (n : name) (prevT : logIndex) (prevI : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex), snd m = AppendEntries t n prevT prevI entries c)
SpecLemmas.handleTimeout_packets : forall (h : name) (d : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg), handleTimeout h d = (out, d', ps) -> In m ps -> ~ (exists (t : term) (n : name) (prevT : logIndex) (prevI : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex), snd m = AppendEntries t n prevT prevI entries c)
raft_net_invariant_append_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
SpecLemmas.handleClientRequest_no_append_entries : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> In m ps -> ~ (exists (t : term) (n : name) (prevT : logIndex) (prevI : term) (entries : list entry) (c0 : logIndex), snd m = AppendEntries t n prevT prevI entries c0)
SpecLemmas.handleRequestVote_no_append_entries : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (h' : fin N) (t lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t h' lli llt = (st', m) -> ~ (exists (t0 : term) (n : name) (prevT : logIndex) (prevI : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex), m = AppendEntries t0 n prevT prevI entries c)
handleAppendEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) (state : raft_data) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) => if t <? currentTerm state then (state, AppendEntriesReply (currentTerm state) entries false) else if prevLogIndex =? 0 then if haveNewEntries state entries then (RaftState.set_raft_data_leaderId term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_type term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_commitIndex term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_log term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (advanceCurrentTerm state t) entries) (Init.Nat.max (commitIndex state...
msg_rect : forall P : msg -> Type, (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term), P (RequestVote t n l t0)) -> (forall (t : term) (b : bool), P (RequestVoteReply t b)) -> (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term) (l0 : list entry) (l1 : logIndex), P (AppendEntries t n l t0 l0 l1)) -> (forall (t : term) (l : list entry) (b : bool), P (AppendEntriesReply t l b)) -> forall m : msg, P m
msg_rec : forall P : msg -> Set, (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term), P (RequestVote t n l t0)) -> (forall (t : term) (b : bool), P (RequestVoteReply t b)) -> (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term) (l0 : list entry) (l1 : logIndex), P (AppendEntries t n l t0 l0 l1)) -> (forall (t : term) (l : list entry) (b : bool), P (AppendEntriesReply t l b)) -> forall m : msg, P m
msg_ind : forall P : msg -> Prop, (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term), P (RequestVote t n l t0)) -> (forall (t : term) (b : bool), P (RequestVoteReply t b)) -> (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term) (l0 : list entry) (l1 : logIndex), P (AppendEntries t n l t0 l0 l1)) -> (forall (t : term) (l : list entry) (b : bool), P (AppendEntriesReply t l b)) -> forall m : msg, P m
msg_sind : forall P : msg -> SProp, (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term), P (RequestVote t n l t0)) -> (forall (t : term) (b : bool), P (RequestVoteReply t b)) -> (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term) (l0 : list entry) (l1 : logIndex), P (AppendEntries t n l t0 l0 l1)) -> (forall (t : term) (l : list entry) (b : bool), P (AppendEntriesReply t l b)) -> forall m : msg, P m
SpecLemmas.doLeader_message_entries : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (e : entry), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> In m ms -> snd m = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> In e (log st)
handleMessage = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (src me : name) (m : msg) (state : raft_data) => match m with | RequestVote t _ lastLogIndex lastLogTerm => let (st, r) := handleRequestVote me state t src lastLogIndex lastLogTerm in (st, [(src, r)]) | RequestVoteReply t voteGranted => (handleRequestVoteReply me state src t voteGranted, []) | AppendEntries t lid prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit => let (st, r) := handleAppendEntries me state t lid prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit in (st, [(src, r)]) | AppendEntriesReply term entries result => handleAppendEntriesReply me state src term entries result end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), name -> name -> msg -> raft_data -> raft_data * list (name *...
SpecLemmas.doLeader_messages : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> In m ms -> snd m = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> t = currentTerm st /\ log st' = log st /\ type st = Leader /\ (plt = 0 \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log st) pli = Some e /\ eTerm e = plt))
update_elections_data_net = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me src : name) (m : msg) (st : electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) => match m with | RequestVote t _ lastLogIndex lastLogTerm => update_elections_data_requestVote me src t src lastLogIndex lastLogTerm st | RequestVoteReply t voteGranted => update_elections_data_requestVoteReply me src t voteGranted st | AppendEntries t lid prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit => update_elections_data_appendEntries me st t lid prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit | AppendEntriesReply _ _ _ => fst st end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), name -> name -> msg ->...-> electionsData Arguments update_elections_data_net {orig_base_params raft_params}
update_elections_data_appendEntries_preserves_allEntries : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (x : term * entry), In x (allEntries (fst (nwState net h))) -> In x (allEntries (update_elections_data_appendEntries h (nwState net h) t n pli plt es ci))

```  
intros net H_refined p t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit H_in_p H_body_p.
unfold terms_and_indices_from_one.
intros e H_in_e.
split.
- apply H_taifoli with (net := net) (p := p) (t := t) (leaderId := leaderId) (prevLogIndex := prevLogIndex) (prevLogTerm := prevLogTerm) (entries := entries) (leaderCommit := leaderCommit).
  + apply H_in_p.
  + apply H_body_p.
- apply H_in_e.
```
